casebody.data:
GREEN
v.
WILSON et al. No. 160PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 1, 2004. Anna Averitt, Robert White Johnson, Wilmington, for Aaron Green and Mildred Pate.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of June 2004 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File New Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Wilson, Holmes, D. Pate) shall have up to and including the 22nd day of June 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of June 2004."
